column2: The  only  eyewitness  to  the  incident,  Shanika  Amali  is  the  sister-in-

column1: law  of  the  deceased.  Her  husband  and  his  brother  (the  deceased)  were
businessmen, who brought their stocks of fish collected from fishermen in
Kalpitiya,  Mannar  and  Uda  Walave  areas.  These  trade  transactions  were
